entry.title: Big Hunk Candy Bars - 24 Pack
entry.summary:
Vendor: Annabelle Candy Co
Type: Candy
Price: 25.99

Retro American Candy Bars

Big Hunk Candy Bars made by Annabelle Candy Company

An American Hunk that you'll love to indulge in! Inside the Big Hunk Candy Bar, you'll discover divine tasting honey infused nougat along with delicious and crunchy bits of roasted peanuts. If you're a fan of nougat, the Big Hunk Candy Bar is ultra chewy, thick and so satisfying, its a must try American Candy Bar!  Coming out in the early 1950s, this Big Hunk isn't going anywhere! Give your customers a glimpse of this Big Hunk, a retro candy they'll love to taste again!
  • Kosher Certified Parve
  • Gluten Free
  • Made in the USA
 1.8 oz Candy Bars | 24 Count Box

Fresh Candy Bars Shipped Fast at Wholesale Prices!

Ingredients:

Corn syrup, sugar, peanuts, honey, dried egg whites, coconut oil, salt, artificial flavour, soy lecithin.

entry.title: Popeye Candy Sticks 24ct - 1 bag
entry.summary:
Vendor: Regal
Type: Candy
Price: 3.00

Have fun with this Retro Candy

A retro candy that'll have you strolling down memory lane! Popeye Candy Sticks are a staple retro candy that should be in the candy aisles of every candy store! After all, they are endorsed by Popeye the Sailor Man himself! Popeye Candy Sticks are a sweet, and crunchy, chalky candy stick that is filled with such sugary goodness and sweet memories! You might not be able to eat them at recess anymore, but they're still just as delicious as you remember them! Take your customers on a sweet journey back to the good old days with Popeye Candy Sticks!

A must for your candy section!

24ct - 1 bag

entry.title: Gustaf's Sugared Licorice Bears 5.2oz - 12 Pack
entry.summary:
Vendor: Gerrit J. Verburg Co.
Type: Candy
Price: 35.00

A Sweet Taste of Dutch Confectionery!

Black Liquorice Teddy Bear Gummies

European Style Candy

This premium licorice candy is made by Gustaf's, most popularly known for their delicious Euro-style old fashioned treats.

Gustaf's Sugared Licorice Bears are soft black licorice gummies that are coated in a blanket of delectable sugar for a crave-worthy combination of sweet & savoury.

Made with real licorice root extract and ammonium chloride for a real authentic European taste of saltiness.

Licorice is a truly favoured treat in Northern & Western Europe that's been around since the 17th century and craved by snackers all over the world!
But did you know that people in The Netherlands consumes the most licorice in the world? Each person nearly eats 4 pounds a year!
That's a lot of cravings to satisfy, and this bulk pack of 12 will surely cure those licorice cravings! 

63.48oz | 12CT

Fresh Licorice Candy Shipped to Canada & the USA!

entry.title: Gustaf's Double Salt Licorice 5.2oz - 12 Pack
entry.summary:
Vendor: Gerrit J. Verburg Co.
Type: Candy
Price: 35.00

A Salty Taste of Dutch Confectionery!

Authentic Liquorice Drops

European Style Candy

Licorice is a truly favoured treat in Northern & Western Europe that's been around since the 17th century and craved by snackers all over the world!

Did you know that people in The Netherlands consumes the most licorice in the world? Each person nearly eats 4 pounds a year! That's a lot of cravings to satisfy, and this bulk pack of 12 will surely cure those licorice cravings!

Gustaf's Double Salt Licorice are strong, firm black licorice candies shaped into coin sized rounds and stamped with the letters "DZ" for "Dubbel Zoute". In other words, Double Salt! 

This premium candy is made by Gustaf's, most popularly known for their Euro-style old fashioned treats.

63.48oz | 12CT
